#summary Golf Markup Langauge Reference: Holes.

= Description =

A GolfCourse Holes structure contains Hole elements.

= Attributes =

 # FromDate - Date of first use of the golf holes as described in the element.
 # ToDate - Date of last use of the golf holes as described in the element.

= Elements =

== Descriptive Elements ==

== Structural Elements ==

 # [[CommonAttributesAndElements Media]] - Media related to the GolfCourse as a whole, not to a particular hole.
 # [[Hole]] - Description of a Hole on the GolfCourse.

The Holes element contains one Hole element for each hole on its parent GolfCourse.
